item.text: [[Agile teachers]] help bring courses to life. They are there to facilitate conversations, and to support self-directed learning and research. Each student int he class becomes a teacher, passing on knowledge they have learned to other students.

In time every student becomes and agile teacher. It is considered a sign that you have mastered a subject, when you are able to pass it on (teach it) to another student. Successfully managing to teach a subject to a number of students __is__ your qualification.

In time every student becomes and agile teacher. It is considered a sign that you have mastered a subject, when you are able to pass it on (teach it) to another student. Successfully managing to teach a subject to a number of students __is__ your qualification.

> __Children:__ 

- [[Agile Teaching]]
- [[Learning Pods]]
- [[Learning Roles]]
- [[Learning Passport]]
- [[Learning TimeBank]]
- [[Nomadic Teaching]]

item.text: [[Agile teachers]] help bring courses to life. They are there to facilitate conversations, and to support self-directed learning and research. Each student in the class becomes a teacher, passing on knowledge they have learned to other students.

- [[Life-like Education]]

- [[Teach it forwards]]

item.text:
# Context

Agile teaching is a new approach to teaching and forms a core part of the [[Academy Methodology]]. Originally derived from the practice of [[Agile Project Management]] it can be considered the supply side of [[Agile Learning]].

story.text: In the Viral Academy we use a modified version of [[Agile Project Management]] as our teaching philosophy and methodology

[[Agile teachers]] help bring courses to life. They are there to facilitate conversations, and to support self-directed learning and research. Each student in the class becomes a teacher, passing on knowledge they have learned to other students.

In time every student becomes and agile teacher. It is considered a sign that you have mastered a subject, when you are able to pass it on (teach it) to another student. Successfully managing to teach a subject to a number of students __is__ your qualification.

# Context

Agile teaching is a new approach to teaching and forms a core part of the [[Academy Methodology]]. Originally derived from the practice of [[Agile Project Management]] it can be considered the supply side of [[Agile Learning]].
